programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o moogvcf.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; iscale does not need to be set here because already 0dbfs = 1 aout vco .3, 220, 1 ; Use a nice sawtooth waveform. kfco line 200, p3, 2000 ; filter-cutoff frequency from .2 to 2 KHz krez init p4 asig moogvcf aout, kfco, krez outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> ;a sine wave f 1 0 16384 10 1
i 1 0 3 .1 i 1 + 3 .7 i 1 + 3 .95 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
